name: Woodcutter Deluxe Edition
description:
Woodcutter Deluxe Edition is a classic platformer, tells the story of Woodcutter whose child was kidnapped. Embark on a magical adventure through the land of Aaran and help Woodcutter retrieve his firstborn.

  • There are 79 levels to complete, filled with coins and enemies,
  • 3 weapons to use (Boomerang, Bow, Explosing barrels) and your body to smash your enemies,
  • You can: run, jump, double jump, wall jump, wall slide, swim and more,
  • Languages (Polish, English, Russian, German),
  • Very long product support is planned!
